publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4131 Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Hand of Friendship and Fellowship Across Scotland—That the Parliament, recalling that King Robert I sent out his supporters after his enthronement in March 1306 to extend the hand of friendship and fellowship across Scotland, sends its greetings and best wishes to the descendants of those courageous and patriotic men and women as they gather from across the globe at Scone on 26 March 2006 to mark the 700th anniversary of the accession of Scotland’s Hero King.

S2M-4131 Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Hand of Friendship and Fellowship Across Scotland—That the Parliament, recalling that King Robert I sent out his supporters after his enthronement in March 1306 to extend the hand of friendship and fellowship across Scotland, sends its greetings and best wishes to the descendants of those courageous and patriotic men and women as they gather from across the globe at Scone on 26 March 2006 to mark the 700th anniversary of the accession of Scotland’s Hero King. Supported by: Bruce Crawford*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Robin Harper*, Shiona Baird*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Alex Johnstone*, Brian Adam*, Stewart Stevenson*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Fiona Hyslop*

S2M-4131 Hand of Friendship and Fellowship Across Scotland (lodged on 16 March 2006) Murdo Fraser*, Phil Gallie*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Margaret Mitchell*, Euan Robson*, Alex Fergusson*, Mr David Davidson*, Mary Scanlon*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-4131 Hand of Friendship and Fellowship Across Scotland (lodged on 16 March 2006) Christine Grahame*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Derek Brownlee*, Donald Gorrie*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-4131 Hand of Friendship and Fellowship Across Scotland (lodged on 16 March 2006) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-4131 Hand of Friendship and Fellowship Across Scotland (lodged on 16 March 2006) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-4131 Hand of Friendship and Fellowship Across Scotland (lodged on 16 March 2006) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-4131 Hand of Friendship and Fellowship Across Scotland (lodged on 16 March 2006) John Scott*
S2M-4131 Hand of Friendship and Fellowship Across Scotland (lodged on 16 March 2006) Linda Fabiani*, Eleanor Scott*
